about me

My name is Alex Novo,
I’m a Photographer.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1624351072444{margin-bottom: 31px !important;}”]The world without photography will be meaningless to us if there is no light and color, which opens up our minds and expresses passion. My photos are inspired by light, color, creative perspective, techniques & personalities.[/vc_column_text]
